DOC.brief_title: Cytokine Body Composition 's Changes Overweight/Obese Women
DOC.detailed_description: Pregnant woman , recruit antenatal clinic , pre-pregnancy BMI ≥ 25 kg/m2 , age > 18 year singleton pregnancy enrol within 12th week Obstetric Unit Policlinico Hospital Modena . Exclusion criterion follow : twin pregnancy , chronic disease ( i.e. , diabetes mellitus , chronic hypertension , untreated thyroid disease ) dietary supplement herbal product know affect body weight , medical condition might affect body weight . At first visit , accurate obstetric history , family history , personal history collect assessment exclusion criterion . The blood pressure , height weight measure , BMI calculate . Eligible woman give nutritional advice lifestyle physical activity , agreement Italian Guidelines healthy diet pregnancy . The diet give comprised 1500 kcal/day consist 3 main meal 3 snack ( breakfast , snack , lunch , snack , dinner , even snack ) correspond baseline metabolism pregnant woman . In view physical activity program , dietitian add amount 200 kcal/day obese 300 kcal/day overweight woman . The exercise intervention focus increase walk develop active lifestyle ( i.e. , walk rather drive short distance ) . The recommended exercise prescription pregnant woman generally consistent recommendation general adult population . All participant advise participate 30 min moderate intensity activity least 3 day week . Each subject take part study receive 75-g 2-h Oral Glucose Tolerance Test ( OGTT ) 16-18 and/or 24-28 week . The diagnosis gestational diabetes mellitus make glucose value exceed normal cut-off , report Guidelines . If OGTT pathological , woman refer health care specialist clinical evaluation and/or specific treatment . Women schedule specific follow-up visit adherence program 16th , 20th , 28th 36th week also evaluate fat mass , fat-free mass total body water use bioimpedance analyzer . Furthermore , baseline 36-38 week , blood plasma sample collect order investigate : plasma pro- anti-inflammatory marker related obesity visceral adipose tissue ( interferon-γ , interleukin-1α , interleukin-1β , interleukin-2 , interleukin-4 , interleukin-6 , interleukin-8 , interleukin-10 , interleukin-12p70 , tumor necrosis factor-α ) . Data regard pregnancy delivery collect clinical diary .
